definitions.definition: Very expensive, or appearing expensive; opulent , luxurious .
examples: They lived in a plush apartment complex.

definitions.definition: Having a soft, fluffy exterior (of a man-made object, especially stuffed animals or upholstery ) .
examples: This plush toy is so cute and soft — I want it!

secondary_definitions: ( UK ) Very expensive, or appearing expensive; opulent , luxurious .
Having a soft, fluffy exterior (of a man-made object, especially stuffed animals or upholstery ) .
